text: Carol Sutton (née Dickerson; December 3, 1944https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:2SNX-483 – December 10, 2020) was an American actress. She was best known for her roles in the movie Steel Magnolias, Monster's Ball, and Ray. Sutton died on December 10, 2020 from COVID-19 in New Orleans at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New Orleans Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Orleans
title: Carol Sutton (actress)
